price: Sila jiraattonni magaalattii isaanii rafaa jiranuu adabbiin keenya halkan isaanitti dhufuu (irraa) of amanuu (sodaa dhabanii)?
arabic: أَفَأَمِنَ أَهۡلُ ٱلۡقُرَىٰٓ أَن يَأۡتِيَهُم بَأۡسُنَا بَيَٰتٗا وَهُمۡ نَآئِمُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: afa-amina ahlu al-qurā an yatiyahum basunā bayātan wahum nāimūna
